vendor_name: Mercure Clear Mountain Lodge, Spa & Vineyard
title: Serene Queensland Hinterland Lodge Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drink
description:
Crowning the lush mountains of Moreton Bay's hinterland, this tranquil escape offers solitude and serenity, only 35 minutes from Brisbane's CBD. With panoramic views across the granite peaks of Queensland's Glass House Mountains, Moreton Bay islands and the sparkling Brisbane skyline, Mercure Clear Mountain Lodge, Spa & Vineyard invites you to inhale crisp mountain air in luxury.

Treat yourself to a rejuvenating treatment at Stephanies Day Spa, wind down in the swimming pool with a few relaxing lengths, or celebrate your escape while overlooking unbeatable views at Mandy's Lakeview Lounge & Dining, enjoying a glass of wine from the lodge's very own vineyard.

Picturesque hikes and breathtaking lookouts await in Glass House Mountains National Park, less than one hour's drive from the lodge. After some exploring, return to your hinterland retreat and unwind with a spot of tennis or stroll through the gardens.
location_description: Mercure Clear Mountain Lodge Spa & Vineyard
offer_address: 564 Clear Mountain Rd, Clear Mountain QLD 4500

vendor_name: Mercure Clear Mountain Lodge, Spa & Vineyard
title: Peaceful Hinterland Retreat Near Brisbane with Panoramic Glass House Mountain Views
description:
Crowning the lush mountains of Moreton Bay's hinterland, Mercure Clear Mountain Lodge offers a tranquil escape amid nature, only a 35-minute drive from Brisbane CBD. Featuring 360-degree panoramic vistas across the granite peaks of Queensland's Glass House Mountains, Moreton Bay islands and the sparkling Brisbane skyline, this relaxing retreat invites you to inhale the crisp mountain air in luxury.

Picturesque hikes and breathtaking lookouts await in Glass House Mountains National Park, less than one hour's drive from the lodge. Then, return to your hinterland retreat and unwind in the expansive outdoor pool, enjoy a hit of tennis or stroll through the gardens. Treat yourself to a rejuvenating treatment at the onsite spa or celebrate your escape while overlooking unbeatable views at Mandy's Lakeview Restaurant, maybe enjoying a glass of wine from the lodge's very own vineyard.
